Your project has a high environmental or social impact which involves a partnership with a public or private structure? Apply now to become the next Convergences Awards Laureate!

With the support of Devex and the City of Paris, the Convergences Awards reward every year since 2011 projects that are initiated by public, private and solidary partnerships seeking to build a fair and sustainable world. The Convergences Awards are open to the projects that shall meet the following criteria:

  • The project is carried out by a solidarity-based organisation;
  • In partnership with a public or private organisation;
  • The project has a high social and/or environmental impact;
  • The project is innovative and replicable

The Convergences Awards have two main categories:

  • The European Award which rewards a project whose beneficiaries are mostly based within the European Union.
  • The International Award which rewards a project whose beneficiaries are mostly based outside the European Union.

This year, the jury also reserves the right to grant a Special “Climate” Award per category if a project is specifically innovative and relevant in addressing climate change.

Apply online until Sunday, April 26th
